english: The apartment is on the fourth floor.
How much do you pay in rent?
The gardener comes once a week.
Ask the doorman to wash our car this afternoon.
transliteration: xálli lbuwwēb yɣássil issayyāra ba3d iɖɖúhur.
arabic: خلّي البُوّاب يْغسِّل السِّيّارة بعْد الضُّهُر.

english: to hang a picture on the wall
arabic: علّق صورة على الحيْط، يْعلِّق صورة على الحيْط

english: I love that painting hanging over the sofa.
transliteration: ktīr ɧabbēt iʂʂūra lm3állʔa fōʔ iʂʂōfa.
arabic: كْتير حبّيْت الصّورة المْعلّْقة فوْق الصّوفة.

english: to beat the dust out of a carpet
transliteration: náffaɖ issijjēdi min ilɣábra, ynáffiɖ issijjēdi min ilɣábra
arabic: نفّض السِّجّادِة مِن الغبْرة، يْنفِّض السِّجّادِة مِن الغبْرة

english: Could you turn off the light in the kitchen, please?
transliteration: fīk tʈáffi llámba b-ilmáʈbax law samáɧt?
arabic: فيك تْطفّي اللمْبة بِالمطْبخ لوْ سمحْت؟

english: The power went out for an hour this afternoon.
The only thing I want to do this evening is watch TV.
transliteration: -šši ilwaɧīd yálli báddi á3mlu ha-llēli húwwi innū áɧɖar tilfizyōn.
arabic: الشّي الوَحيد يَلّي بدّي أعْمْلو هالْليْلِة هُوِّ إنّو إحْضر تِلْفِزْيوْن.

english: Dinner's ready! Come to the table!
Just put it in the microwave for two minutes.
I heated up the soup in the microwave.
double bed, queen bed, king bed
to sleep, fall asleep, go to sleep, go to bed
I only got four or five hours’ sleep last night.
transliteration: mbēriɧ nímit bass šī árba3 aw xámas sē3āt.
arabic: مْبارِح نِمِت بس شي أرْبع أوْ خمس ساعات.

english: What time did you go to bed?

transliteration: ʈabb rāsu u nēm, yʈubb rāsu u ynēm
arabic: طبّ راسو ونام، يْطُبّ راسو ويْنام

english: I was feeling sleepy, so I took a short nap.
unable to get to sleep, have a restless night’s sleep
You don’t look like you slept well.
I woke up at six o’clock in the morning.
I woke up at six o’clock in the morning.
A loud noise woke me up.
transliteration: fiʔít min wára ʂōt ʔáwi u múz3ij.
arabic: فِقِت مِن وَرا صوْت قَوي ومُزْعِج.

english: to get up, get out of bed
transliteration: ʔām min ittáxit, yʔūm min ittáxit
arabic: قام مِن التّخِت، يْقوم مِن التّخِت

english: I set my alarm for six in the morning.
to dry off, towel oneself off
